lead_paragraph: Bulgaria coach Ivaylo Petev has named Brazil-born midfielder Marcelinho in his squad for the first time for this month's friendlies at Portugal and Macedonia, the Bulgarian Football Union (BFU) said.

headline.print_headline: Brazil-Born Marcelinho Gets Bulgaria Call for Friendlies
headline.main: Brazil-Born Marcelinho Gets Bulgaria Call for Friendlies

snippet: Bulgaria coach Ivaylo Petev has named Brazil-born midfielder Marcelinho in his squad for the first time for this month's friendlies at Portugal and Macedonia, the Bulgarian Football Union (BFU) said....
